sections.EXECUTION: ): Squads will walk to the range. Upon occupation of the range, the Platoon will occupy an ORP to leave from to go to their respective battle positions. sections.END STATE: All Bull Troop Infantry Teams and Squads are certified in digging deliberate and hasty battle positions IAW ADP 3-90.
